roleset.name: to convert plant material (grass, clover, etc) into hay
roleset.note: HAY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hay' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus and on the 'gather' frameset. frame by Perryn (from hay.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: hay is for horses
example.text: The farmer hayed during the morning.
